name: 13.01-Fastq-tools: Fastq-grep
description: Given a PATTERN, specified as a perl-compatible regular expression, print every FASTQ entry with a matching nucleotide sequence

parameters.name: PATTERN
parameters.description: PATTERN, by default, is a perl compatible regular expression

parameters.name: Output mismatch
parameters.description: Output mismatching entries to the given file

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Output only the number of matching sequences

parameters.name: Match read id
parameters.description: Match the read id (by default, sequence is matched)

parameters.name: Trim after
parameters.description: Trim output after the match end

parameters.name: Trim before
parameters.description: Trim output before the match end

parameters.name: Trim match
parameters.description: Trim the match itself, regardless of trimming mode
